title: Very Large Top Floor 1BR - BAY VIEW, Huge Kitchen, Balcony
posting_body: Available now is this very large one bedroom apartment located in the Belmont Hills.
It features a large living room that leads to a huge patio with a view of the Bay, East Bay Hills, San Mateo Bridge and Mount Diablo.
The large open kitchen features very generous counter space and newer appliances including a dishwasher and granite counters.
The oversized bedroom has a wall-to-wall closet which is in addition to the large hall closet and linen closet.
The apartment comes with a covered carport and additional storage which are all included in the rent.
NO ADDITIONAL UTILITY CHARGES at the end of the month.
The building is very quiet and has a swimming pool and laundry room.
The rent is $2200 per month which includes water, sewer, parking, storage and trash collection.
The lease term is one year
A credit check and with good credit is mandatory.
No pets, no smoking, and no barbecues.
For more information or to set up an appointment to view the apartment, please give us a call using the information in the link.
